channel.title: [562/660] Project Dungeonfest Dice Game
channel.description: im trying to code the dice game for my project dungeonfest source and idk exactly how to and every tut i see on it gives me an error so would somebody please tell me how to code dice and where to put the codes like in what folder and if i need to create a new .java folder or whatever please tell me what to call it or watever...

item.title: [562/660] Project Dungeonfest Dice Game
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

It’d be better if you made the attempt to do it, got an error, and then came here asking for help with that error. You’d probably receive help then - even if it was from a tutorial. Do that, and I’ll help you, but I’m not going to just spoon-feed you lines of code.

Read full topic
